categories: Category:Outer Rim Territories planets on the Hydian Way

nodes.text: Botajef was a planet located in the Belsmuth sector of the Outer Rim Territories, known for its shipyards.

Botajef was the location of Botajef Shipyards where AA-9 Coruscant freighters were built. Botajef's southern continent was covered in ship-manufacturing facilities where designs such as the AA-9 were designed, built and tested. Huge 325-kilometer elevator cables stretched from the surface of the world to the orbiting yards.
Natasi Daala grew up on Botajef, in a COMPNOR orphanage ran by Renatasian nuns.
Around 22 BBY, the luxury liner Salin Mariner was sabotaged by the pirate Hondo Ohnaka during a cruise from Lianna to Botajef.
A battle occurred above Botajef in 19 BBY during the Ciutric Offensive.
By 4 ABY, the planet had become an Imperial fortress world.
In 127 ABY it was the site of the Battle of Botajef, where the Galactic Alliance-aligned Mandalorians fought against the army of the Fel Empire.
